item.title: Contact
item.description: The quickest way to reach me would be to tweet @podrezo. I am also on LinkedIn. If you need to send me confidential information, you can use PGP. My PGP Fingerprint is C6C1 04E8 5A8E 10D5 3864 FEB6 2409 4649 83B1 0004   Download my public key

item.title: Jira Connector for Google Data Studio
item.description: This community connector enables Google Data Studio to crunch Kanban-type statistics like lead time directly from Jira’s API.
